name: Kiss Ribbit Kill
description:
Kiss Ribbit Kill is a visual novel made for a 3 day game jam.

Its a little rough around the edges but I believe it is quite fun. Controls are solely the mouse button or touch from phones.

Fixes will be applied tomorrow for most broken things.

Written by https://imasuperturtle.itch.io/
Drawn by https://emily2.itch.io/
Crudely patched together by https://bouncingturtlegames.itch.io/
